```{r echo = FALSE, results='hide', warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
devtools::load_all()
```

##Getting Vector Data 



###Getting National Hydrography Dataset Flowlines

```{r, message=FALSE}
nhd = findNHD(clip_unit = list("UCSB", 10, 10))
str(nhd, max = 1)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
explore(nhd)
```


###National Hydrography Dataset Watershed Boundaries

```{r}
huc10 = findHUC(clip_unit = list("UCSB", 10, 10))
str(nhd, max = 1)
```

```{r}
explore(huc10)
```

### Get World Waterbodies

The polygons represent the open water rivers, lakes, seas, and oceans of the world.

```{r, message= FALSE}
wb = findWaterbodies(clip_unit = list("UCSB", 20, 20))
str(wb, max = 1)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
explore(wb)
```

### Get US Census TIGER Road Networks

```{r, message = FALSE}
tiger = findRoads(clip_unit = list("UCSB", 10, 10))
str(tiger, max = 1)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
explore(tiger)
```
